name: Ferdinand Magellan
what_did:
Magellan led the first expedition to sail all the way around the world.
He proved the Earth could be circled by ship, even though he didn’t survive the whole journey.
His crew finished the trip after he died in the Philippines.
why_matters:
Magellan’s voyage showed how big and connected the world really is.
It helped people understand Earth’s shape and size.
His journey opened new paths for global trade and exploration.

questions.q: What did Magellan try to do?

options: The Earth can be sailed around
You can live on the Moon

fun_fact: Even though Magellan died before the journey ended, his crew still finished sailing around the whole planet!
